p: After further virtual screening and modeling of the interaction of DDX helicase with the Sinex library of compounds, several potential DDX inhibitors were synthesized and tested as inhibitors of DDX helicase activity. The experimental results confirmed that 4 and 5 ( Table 2) among the 27 selected compounds inhibited the DDX3 helicase activity with high potency (IC 50 0.2–0.3 μM) [ 118].
